A frontend application that fetches all dynamic data from backend APIs
A backend API server that connects to a PostgreSQL database using specified environment variables
Database schema supporting barbers, services, and client notification records
UI for browsing existing barbers with name, photo and specialization details
UI for browsing available services with name, description and pricing information
Functionality to add new barbers including name, contact info, and specialization
Functionality to add new services including name, description, duration and price
Integration capability to send WhatsApp notifications to clients
User interface styled with snow-themed background and dim gray interface elements
Responsive layout suitable for desktop and mobile browsing
Authentication mechanism for admin access to manage barbers and services
Form validation for barber and service creation inputs
Client-side routing for navigation between barbers, services and management sections
Notification log or history tracking sent messages
Concurrent development server setup for frontend and backend via npm scripts
